title.native: キミとアイドルプリキュア♪

description:
The main character, Sakura Uta, is a second-year middle school student who loves to sing. One day, she meets the fairy Purirun that has come to search for the Legendary Protectors, Idol Precure! Purirun's hometown, KirakiLand has been plunged into total darkness by Darkine, the boss of the Chokkiri Gang. Meanwhile, the sparkles of the townspeople are being stolen by the Chokkiri Gang... it's a huge pinch!
"I want to make it sparkle sparkly! Here is my song!" - With this determination, Uta transforms into the Legendary Protector, Cure Idol! She sings, dances, and gives fan service, making it sparkle no matter how pitch-black it is!
hashtag: #キミとアイドルプリキュア #キミプリ

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Dancing
tags.description: Centers around the art of dance.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Fairy
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

tags.name: Tokusatsu
tags.description: Prominently features elements that resemble special effects in Japanese live-action shows

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Restaurant
tags.description: Features a business that prepares and serves food and drinks to customers. Also encompasses cafes and bistros.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/東堂いづみ) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Izumi_Todo)

Izumi Toudou is a collective pseudonym for [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/)'s staff.
A Japanese anime director, storyboard artist, and animator.

[Official Site](https://erika-fukasawa.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Fukaeri_Comp) 

**Erika Fukasawa** is a Japanese composer and arranger.

[Website](https://kumaka.jp/) | [Profile (Apollo Bay)](https://apollobay.jp/talent/熊田茜音/) | [Profile (Amuse)](https://artist.amuse.co.jp/artist/kumada_akane/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/official_kumaka) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kumadakane_official/)

Akane Kumada is a Japanese voice actress and singer. She is affiliated with Apollo Bay and made her voice acting debut in 2018.

__Height:__ 159 cm

She is a Japanese voice actress affiliated with Pro Fit seiyuu management agency.

[Profile](http://www.pro-fit.co.jp/talent_takamori.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/takamori_723) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/29114.html) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Natsumi_Takamori) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%AB%98%E6%A3%AE%E5%A5%88%E6%B4%A5%E7%BE%8E) | [VNDB](https://vndb.org/s979)

**Non-anime roles:**
- [Homura Ootomo](https://vndb.org/c9922) - _Maji de Watashi ni Koishinasai! S_
- [Ochiba Tachibana](https://vndb.org/c17042) - _AstralAir no Shiroki Towa_
- [Wakana Kariya](https://vndb.org/c26601) - _Sanoba Witch_
- Miruhj - _Utawarerumono: Itsuwari no Kamen/Futari no Hakuoro_
- [Korona Kusakabe](https://vndb.org/c35363) - _Miagete Goran, Yozora no Hoshi o_
- [Mako Hitachi](https://vndb.org/c44769) - _Senren * Banka_
- [Yuura Fuma](https://vndb.org/c55100) - _Neko-nin exHeart_
- [Ghost](https://vndb.org/c67681) - _9-Nine_
- Kaori - _Princess Connect Re:Dive_
- Aither - _Epic 7_
- Vertin - _Reverse: 1999_

__[Artist Profile (MONACA)](http://www.monaca.jp/staff/hirokawa.html)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kayone87)__

__Keiichi Hirokawa__ is a Japanese music composer and arranger who belongs to sound production studio MONACA.

__[Artist Profile (MONACA)](http://www.monaca.jp/staff/hirokawa.html)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kayone87)__

__Keiichi Hirokawa__ is a Japanese music composer and arranger who belongs to sound production studio MONACA.
